SEARCH
Package it.astromark.agenda.reception.service

Interface ReceptionAgendaService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReceptionAgendaServiceImpl
public interface ReceptionAgendaService
Service interface for managing reception agendas and timeslots. Provides methods for booking, confirming, refusing, and retrieving reception timeslots and bookings.

  • Method Details

    • book

      boolean book(Integer receptionTimeslotID)
      Books a reception timeslot for a given ID.
      Parameters:
      receptionTimeslotID - the ID of the reception timeslot to be booked
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is successfully booked, false otherwise Pre-condition: - The `receptionTimeslotID` must not be null. - The timeslot associated with the given ID must exist and be available for booking. Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as booked. - Returns true if booking is successful, false if the timeslot is not available or does not exist.

    • confirm

      boolean confirm(ReceptionBookingId receptionTimeslotID)
      Confirms a previously booked reception timeslot.
      Parameters:
      receptionTimeslotID - the ID of the reception timeslot to confirm
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is successfully confirmed, false otherwise Pre-condition: - The `receptionTimeslotID` must not be null. - The timeslot associated with the given ID must exist and have been booked. Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as confirmed. - Returns true if confirmation is successful, false otherwise.

    • refuse

      boolean refuse(ReceptionBookingId receptionTimeslotID)
      Refuses a reception timeslot for a given ID.
      Parameters:
      receptionTimeslotID - the ID of the reception timeslot to refuse
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is successfully refused, false otherwise Pre-condition: - The `receptionTimeslotID` must not be null. - The timeslot associated with the given ID must exist and have been booked. Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as refused. - Returns true if refusal is successful, false otherwise.

    • addTimeslot

      ReceptionTimeslotResponse addTimeslot(ReceptionTimeslotRequest request)
      Adds a new reception timeslot.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing timeslot details
      Returns:
      the added `ReceptionTimeslotResponse` object Pre-condition: - The `request` must not be null and must contain valid timeslot details. Post-condition: - A new timeslot is added and returned as a response object.

    • getNotConfirmed

      List<ReceptionBookingResponse> getNotConfirmed(Integer tableId)
      Retrieves a list of not confirmed bookings for a given table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - the ID of the table to retrieve bookings for
      Returns:
      a list of `ReceptionBookingResponse` objects representing not confirmed bookings Pre-condition: - The `tableId` must not be null. Post-condition: - Returns a list of bookings that are in a "not confirmed" state for the specified table.

    • getRefused

      List<ReceptionBookingResponse> getRefused(Integer tableId)
      Retrieves a list of refused bookings for a given table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - the ID of the table to retrieve bookings for
      Returns:
      a list of `ReceptionBookingResponse` objects representing refused bookings Pre-condition: - The `tableId` must not be null. Post-condition: - Returns a list of bookings that are in a "refused" state for the specified table.

    • getBookedSlots

      List<ReceptionBookingResponse> getBookedSlots()
      Retrieves a list of all booked reception slots.
      Returns:
      a list of `ReceptionBookingResponse` objects representing booked slots Pre-condition: - None. Post-condition: - Returns a list of all timeslots that are currently booked.

    • getSlots

      List<ReceptionTimeslotResponse> getSlots(@NotNull @NotNull UUID teacherID)
      Retrieves a list of all reception timeslots for a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherID - the UUID of the teacher
      Returns:
      a list of `ReceptionTimeslotResponse` objects representing the teacher's timeslots Pre-condition: - The `teacherID` must not be null. Post-condition: - Returns a list of timeslots associated with the specified teacher.

    • createReceptionTimetable

      ReceptionTimetable createReceptionTimetable(UUID teacherId, String textInfo)
      Creates a reception timetable for a specific teacher with the provided text information.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the UUID of the teacher for whom the timetable is being created
      textInfo - the text information about the reception timetable
      Returns:
      the created `ReceptionTimetable` object Pre-condition: - The `teacherId` and `textInfo` must not be null. - The teacher with the specified `teacherId` must exist. Post-condition: - A new reception timetable is created, associated with the specified teacher, and saved in the repository. - The timetable includes the provided text information and has a start validity date of the current day.
